start.title: Steer challenge
start.content: Steer the big ship through Suez Canal.

collision.title: Collision!!
collision.content: Ops, the digger guy has work to do.

arrive.title: Congratulations!!
arrive.content: Wow, you just save the world economy!!
arrive.shareInfo: Invite friend to challenge your score.
arrive.shareContent: I just save the world economy in $t(minutes, {"count": {{count}} }), $t(seconds, {"count": {{second}} }) and traveled {{distance}}km ðŸ˜Ž, who can beat me ?

userInfoPanel.title: You just made it!!
userInfoPanel.description: Submit your score to see how good you are.

gameInfoPanel.description: This is a non-scientific simulator game and modified from an interactive page made by CNN for entertainment purpose. It needs a group of people to running a real container ship and need take many factors into consideration.
gameInfoPanel.manual_1: The game has 2 mode, you can press 'NORMAL/HARD' to switch it.
gameInfoPanel.manual_2: 'Top Rank' shows the top 25 list which pass the game with the fastest time.
gameInfoPanel.manual_3: Use buttons or arrow to control the ship.

stuckSpotInfo: Attention, you are going to pass through the stuck spot.
